author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Watch my Nebula Original film BOOMERS right now at https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

Get 40% off an annual subscription to Nebula: https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

University is broken. Students are paying through the nose. Graduates are struggling to find jobs. And a degree no longer seems to be the key to social mobility it once was. How did higher education fall apart, and how can we fix it?

Written, directed, and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Additional research and production assistance by Jack Carter.

*Chapters*
00:00 The Great University Scam
02:07 How University Became So Expensive
21:39 Why Graduates Can’t Get Jobs
34:49 Can Universities Solve Social Mobility?
44:10 A Game of Risk
48:12 How to Sort Your Algorithm (Abandon It)

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Nebula at https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-why-university-feels-like-a-scam-now

Support my work on Patreon at https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

Twitch: http://twitch.tv/t
title: Why University Feels Like a Scam Now
